modName: Ambivalent Crossbow Anims (walk with hands by side)
summary: Replaces the Crossbow walking anims from DLC01 with the vanilla walking ones so you walk with the Crossbow by your side.
descriptionHtml:
[b][size=5][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/16018]Special Edition Version Available[/url][/size][/b]

This is just a personal mod which I am sharing for anyone who wants it.

I simply replaced the walking crossbow animations with the normal (female) walking ones from the vanilla game, it can barely be considered a mod

I started doing my own walking animation all sexy and sassy etc, but then I thought; "f*ck this," so I just did this instead

The sideways animations look absurd, no, actually I pissed myself laughing at how bad it was, but that's half the fun isn't it??

No?

Well, who cares, I still prefer this to the regular two hand ones.

[youtube]gezi6t2bXDE[/youtube]

Oh, this will effect male characters in theory, but how often do you see male npc walking with their crossbow drawn? Running yes, but not walking. However, if you are worried about that I suggest you use FNIS PCEA2 so your Char has her own animations. These aren't very feminine anyway tho..

-Roh
author: Cant remember
